mapper.insert:
SELECT #{schulCode} || NVL(LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CODE, -3)) + 1, 3, '0'), '001') FROM SCHAFS_SCHDUL WHERE SCHUL_CODE = #{schulCode}
INSERT INTO SCHAFS_SCHDUL (SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CODE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_NM, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CN, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_SE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_BGNDE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_ENDDE, SCHUL_CODE) VALUES (#{schafsSchdulCode}, #{schafsSchdulNm}, #{schafsSchdulCn}, #{schafsSchdulSe}, #{schafsSchdulBgnde}, #{schafsSchdulEndde}, #{schulCode})
mapper.select: SELECT SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CODE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_NM, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CN, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_SE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_BGNDE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_ENDDE, SCHUL_CODE FROM SCHAFS_SCHDUL WHERE SCHUL_CODE = #{schulCode}

SELECT ROWNUM, SUB.* FROM ( SELECT SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CODE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_NM, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CN, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_SE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_BGNDE, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_ENDDE, SCHUL_CODE FROM SCHAFS_SCHDUL WHERE SCHUL_CODE = #{schulCode} AND SCHAFS_SCHDUL_BGNDE >= SYSDATE ORDER BY SCHAFS_SCHDUL_BGNDE ASC, SCHAFS_SCHDUL_CODE ASC ) SUB WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
